original: Åkerman, Johan Gustaf, professor, Göteborg, f. 4/3/88 i Wien av envoyén Henrik A. o. frih :an Louise Liljencrantz. G. 24 m. Anna-Lisa Ekelund. Barn: Sven Johan f. 25, DHS, Sthlm, Kristina 28, iStud., Sthlm. — Mog:ex. 06, jur. kand. i Upps. 13, jur. lic. i Lund 23, jur. dr s: å. Attaché resp. tf. andre sekr. i UD 15-18, doc. i nat:-ekon. v. Lunds univ. 23, prof. i nat:-ekon. o. sociologi v. Gbgs högsk. sed. 311. Skr.: Realkapital und Kapitalzins I-H (23-24), Den industr. rationaliseringen (Stat. ofif. utredn. 31), Mjölk- regleringen (37), Engeilsik arbetslöshet o. arbetslöshet (47) m. ;fL, art. i bl. a. Ekon. tidsikr. LVVS. Hobby: trädgårdsskötsel.
translated: Åkerman, Johan Gustaf, professor, Gothenburg, b. 4/3/88 in Vienna to envoy Henrik A. and Baroness Louise Liljencrantz. Married 24 m. to Anna-Lisa Ekelund. Children: Sven Johan b. 25, DHS, Stockholm, Kristina b. 28, studying in Stockholm. Received degree: Mog: ex. 06, law degree in Uppsala 13, licentiate in law in Lund 23, Doctor of Laws the same year. Attaché and acting second secretary at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs 15-18, lecturer in natural economics at Lund University 23, professor in natural economics and sociology at Gothenburg University since 31. Publications: Real Capital and Interest I-II (23-24), Industrial Rationalization (Statistical Office Investigation 31), Milk Regulation (37), Unemployment in England and Unemployment (47) with co-authors, articles in various publications, including Economic Periodical LVVS. Hobby: gardening.
